name: Contact Entity II
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Horror Adventures © 2016, Paizo Inc.
target: up to 20 entities of 12 HD or fewer
text: This spell functions like contact entity I, except that you can contact creatures from the contact entity II list, and as noted above.
text_zh: 此法术如同联系怪诞存在 I(contact entity I)般作用，除了你可以接触联系怪诞存在 II列表中的生物，如上图所述。
